comment.author: 63411822@N04
comment._content: I would think that is in Calgary, but not sure where I think that is one of the old street cars

comment.author: 68323614@N08
comment._content: This is a car of the Calgary Municipal Railway, which is the forerunner of the current Calgary Transit System. The system was started on Monday July 5, 1909 A photo of a car that is identical (it seems) to this one is found here: www.davesrailpix.com/odds/ab/htm/cmr01.htm
